item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description: It'll be November 1st with venue to be confirmed very shortly. I'll probably do a post on barcampcork.com over the weekend with a formal announcement.
item.content:encoded: It’ll be November 1st with venue to be confirmed very shortly. I’ll probably do a post on barcampcork.com over the weekend with a formal announcement.

item.title: By: Frank
item.dc:creator: Frank
item.description: Excellent. Was very disappointed to miss the last one, and heard excellent reports. Looking forward to seeing what crops up to try and block my attending this time. By hook or by crook I'm going ot be there though!
item.content:encoded: Excellent. Was very disappointed to miss the last one, and heard excellent reports. Looking forward to seeing what crops up to try and block my attending this time. By hook or by crook I’m going ot be there though!

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description: I'm getting lots of feedback along the lines of "the earlier the better" so I'm tending towards suggesting Saturday October 25th. So let's run that up the flagpole etc etc
item.content:encoded: I’m getting lots of feedback along the lines of “the earlier the better” so I’m tending towards suggesting Saturday October 25th. So let’s run that up the flagpole etc etc

item.title: By: iia blog » You want networking? You got networking!
item.dc:creator: iia blog » You want networking? You got networking!
item.description: [...] as Keith points out in the comentsÂ there is currently a poll running on Web 2.0 Ireland about a date for the next Cork BarCamp. Am I right in thinking that BarCamps involve leaning against a bar rather than drinking coffee? [...]
item.content:encoded: [...] as Keith points out in the comentsÂ there is currently a poll running on Web 2.0 Ireland about a date for the next Cork BarCamp. Am I right in thinking that BarCamps involve leaning against a bar rather than drinking coffee? [...]

item.title: By: Gordon
item.dc:creator: Gordon
item.description:
The first barcamp in Cork kicked off the whole networking for me. I met people like Tom, Will and Conor there for the first time and I remember an interesting talk by Eoghan about SEO :)
November isn't soon enough, looking forward to it.
item.content:encoded:
The first barcamp in Cork kicked off the whole networking for me. I met people like Tom, Will and Conor there for the first time and I remember an interesting talk by Eoghan about SEO

November isn’t soon enough, looking forward to it.
